review:
I have visited Dr. Praveen for dental surgery.  The extraction was bit complex and I was afraid as well because it was my first ever dental visit for any reason. Doctor has explained the problem very clearly and he made me feel confident & comfortable with this procedure. He assured that it will be 30 mins procedure with assurance of pain free. The same happened. The surgery was pain less. And it's been 3 days now, I am not facing any issue. Also doctor gave his number to connect any time if any issue happens.
I truly appreciate his way of treatment and friendliness with patients. Recomend the doctor. Easy to reach and available on weekends as well.
Doctor is highly recommended for dental issues.
Thankyou Dr. Praveen.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visited this clinic today because I was concerned about my premolar extraction for braces. On quora and YouTube comments on the topic of 'extraction retraction regret' filled with negative reviews and people are saying that many problems come with premolar extraction like flat face, TMJ pain, Airways problem little space in mouth for tongue and sunken face etc. I'm 25 years now and I'm getting my braces treatment from somewhere else because I didn't know about Dr Praveen yadav earlier. My orthodontics suggested to extract two upper premolar because I've Crowded teeth. 
After reading all these negative reviews I was nervous for my facial change and problems bcz I've already extracted 1 premolar and was about to extract next 1.
So I discussed all these issue with Dr Praveen yadav and he said not to worry not even a single problem comes with extraction of premolar. 
Finally I'm going to continue my journey of braces

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We consulted Dr. Praveen to have our 4-year-old undergo a Root Canal Treatment (RCT). Initially, we were quite apprehensive due to our child's age, but Dr. Praveen alleviated our concerns by skillfully engaging our son in conversation, making it feel as if he were talking to a friend of the same age.

We sincerely appreciate Dr. Praveen for providing excellent treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Honestly hearing people's stories of wisdom tooth extraction, I was a bit sceptical of going ahead with the procedure but the way Dr Praveen did the entire procedure with so much ease and same time explained every bit of it and made it pain-free. I would highly recommend for the dental procedure.

I have visited n took toot surgical toot extraction, he was in hurry bcoz aftr me one more patient has came and he wanted to home but in tht situation he has done my all procedure in hurry n I got badly pain aftr taking 3 pain killers, although I had to tak only 1 pain killer, bcoz I was in bad pain I had to , but still bleeding ,,,pain was continuously there in entire night I cldnt sleep I was badly crying still I drop a MSG an asked dr ,,** *** ***** ** **** ****** *** ***** **** *** **** ** **** *** *** ***** **** *** **** ********* ***** *** **** ****** **** ********,,thn he said pain will go don't worry relax .....but I was in pain only for next 6 dys and aftr 8 days he said u hav to come again to open your stitches,i went again then he was at timing of my this unstitching he asked me you should not talk to me like this....n wasn't able to spoken bcoz I have opened my mouth ,,,,** *** *** **** ** ***** ** *** * *** *** ** ***** **** *** * **** ** **** **** **** ***********.aftr this session he asked me again u hav used wrong words ,u shld not talk to me lik this * ** ***** ***** **** ****** **** ***** **** ****** *** *,I was like this much arrogance tht to being a dr.....* **** * **** *** **** ********* **** ******* ** *** * *** *** **** ** *** ****** ******* **** ** ** ***** *** **** ** ********* * ***** ***** ******** *** * ***** * **** ***** ******** *** ************ ***** * **** **** ******** ********* * **** *** *** ** ***** ***** **** ****** **** ****** *** ***** **** *** ** ***** ..he was badly shouting finally was gttng late for my home so I said anywys dr ..... And I returned back my home ...it was really bad experience with Dr PRAVEEN YADAV IN UTTAM NAGR,,,BAD EXPERIENCE...*** ****** ******* *** ****** ****  **** ** **** ***** ** ** ****** **** ** ******* ** ***** ** *** ***** ***** ********* **** ****** ******** ** ********* ***** *** ********* ** *** ***** ******* ** ** ******** ***** *

review: I visited Dr Praveen Yadav, after reading his reviews, for my missing tooth, for which he suggested Dental Implant. The procedure was completely painless. I'm writing this review after 3 months as now my crown is fixed over the implant... Now I can say that i'm completely satisfied both with Dr Praveen and treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Dentaris, Dwarka mor clinic as I was suffering from severe tooth pain. The doctors comforted me and explained the reason of pain as well as treatment options. I went ahead with RCT which was completed In Single SITTING only!!!!!! Highly recommended clinic. The whole experience was soothing.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had missing front tooth since a long time. Different dentists gave me different advices. But Dr Praveen and Dr Aditi both thoroughly checked me and explained me the best treatment in simple words that I understood. And now I have got my tooth fixed ,it almost looks natural. Big thanx to both doctors.

I visited Dr Praveen for braces, Dr recommend me ceramic bracing for me. The process was painless that I never imagined. The cost of process was quite less as compared to other Doctors in Dwarka area. It’s not about cost but the quality of treatment was exceptional.

I came to Dentaris,Uttam Nagar a few days before my marriage to get my smile corrected. The whole team of doctors at clinic explained me the whole treatment in simple language and gave me beautiful smile within 10 days that included some veneers etc. The best part was genuine advice and no hidden charges.Highly recommended

The same happened. The surgery was pain less. And it's been 3 days now, I am not facing any issue. Also doctor gave his number to connect any time if any issue happens.
I truly appreciate his way of treatment and friendliness with patients. Recomend the doctor. Easy to reach and available on weekends as well.
Doctor is highly recommended for dental issues.
Thankyou Dr. Praveen.

I came for tooth removal as I had lot of pain and had fear of RCT as my previous experience with some other dentist was bad. But after repeated assurances from Dr Praveen,I said yes to RCT and believe me ...the procedure was absolutely painless!!!! I could not believe. Thank you team Dentaris and I would strongly recommend this clinic to everyone who has dental phobia.

Dentists at dentaris are expert and professional. Clinic was very hygienic and well maintained sterilisation protocols. I had an immediate implant which was totally painless. I also got single sitting painless RCT . Highly recommended .stuff is patient friendly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor explained the problem in the most simplest way and treatment was completely painless. For one root canal, doctor had complete patience and let every wound heal in nature's own course. Doctor also explained the problems, side effects etc of the situation.
Got treatment for cavity (Filling). Friendly nature, clean clinic, told every possibilities of treatment and what's best for the now . Really happy with the treatment. :-)

I got my complete Tooth Treatment (i.e. filling , wisdom tooth extraction) Reasonable cost of treatment, no hidden charges and excellent patient dental care. Dr. Parveen is very humble and calming during the treatment. Kudos to him.

From my experience, I would definitely recommend Dr Praveen. I got my upper denture made and some fixed lower teeth. I liked the way he planned my treatment and executed it. The best part was quick and painless treatment. Thank you doctors.
Highly recommended. Clinic was very clean. Whole process of treatment was explained before starting the treatment.

Have had multiple experiences for myself and my family for procedures such as rct and tooth removal. The treatment was quick and painless and no unnecessary seatings. Would recommend to anyone seeking dental treatment.

I got some teeth removal and 6 implants done from Dr Praveen. The whole procedure was well explained and hygienically carried out. My entire surgery was painless. The clinic is equipped with latest technology. Highly recommended.

I visited Dr Praveen on recommendation of my friend from Janakpuri, Delhi for wisdom tooth extraction. My experience was even better than  as told by my friend. Actually, my past experiences with dentists were very poor. Dr Praveen is of different breed. The whole process of extraction was painless and quite smooth. He is very experienced Doctor. Further, he is very good in post extraction consultations. I highly recommend him for such kind of procedures.
